import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import MovieKeywords from "../movies/MovieKeywords"; import TvShowKeywords from "../tvshow/TvShowKeywords"; import Trailer from "../movies/Trailer"; import ModalComponent from "./ModalComponent"; const DetailsComponent = ({ data, serieDetail = false, movieDetail = false, seasonDetails = false, episodeDetails = false, }) => { const trailerMovie = useSelector((state) => state.movie.movieTrailer.data); const trailerShow = useSelector((state) => state.series.tvTrailer.data); return (
{seasonDetails && (
Air Date: {data.air_date?.split("-")[2]}. {data.air_date?.split("-")[1]}.{data.air_date?.split("-")[0]}
{data.vote_average}
Overview {data.overview}
)} {episodeDetails && (
{data.still_path ? ( ) : ( )}
Air Date: {data.air_date.split("-")[2]}. {data.air_date.split("-")[1]}.{data.air_date.split("-")[0]}
{data.vote_average.toFixed(1)}
Overview {data.overview}
)} {movieDetail && (
{data.title}{" "} {data.release_date && `(${data.release_date.split("-")[0]})`}
  • {data.release_date && `${data.release_date.split("-")[2]}`}/ {data.release_date && `${data.release_date.split("-")[1]}`}/ {data.release_date && `${data.release_date.split("-")[0]}`}
    • {data.genres?.map((item, index) => { return (
    • {item.name}
    ); })}
  • {Math.floor(data.runtime / 60)}h {data.runtime % 60}min
    • {data.vote_average && (
    {data.vote_average.toFixed(1)}
    )}
    User Score
    type === "Trailer") .slice(0, 1)} trailer={true} />
    {data.tagline} Overview {data.overview}
    Visit Homepage
    Status: {data.status}
    )} {serieDetail && (
    Go to Tv Shows {data && (
    {data.name}{" "} {data.first_air_date && `(${data.first_air_date?.split("-")[0]})`} {data.genres?.map((item, index) => { return (
    {item.name}
    ); })}
    {data.vote_average && (
    {data.vote_average.toFixed(1)}
    )}
    User Score
    type === "Trailer") .slice(0, 1)} tvTrailer={true} />
    {data.tagline} Overview {data.overview}
    Visit Homepage
    Status: {data.status}
    )}
    )}
    ); }; export default DetailsComponent;
